pages.text: By default, the $(2)Sphere Mode$() sets the Projector to generate a force field in the shape of a sphere that is exactly 1 block thick. Each $(5)Scale Module$() increases the size of the force field by 1 block.

pages.title: Field Adjustment
pages.text: Adding $(5)Scale Module$()s to item slots marked with a directional arrow further increases the radius of the force field by 1 block per module.

pages.title: Projection
pages.text: A scaled $(2)Sphere Mode$() field being projected.
